attributes.action: give Bernard Cribbens a Knighthood for services to childrens television and general cosiness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Cribbens needs to be knighted for telling stories on Jackanory in his comforting, slightly mischeivious tone with his wild gesticulations. For being Albert Perks the lovely station master in the Railway Children. A run of comedy records built to last. The Dr Who appearances going back to the Dalek movies in the 1960s. The recent appearance on Nevermind The Buzzcocks that inspired Noel Fielding to ask him to write for the Boosh he was that funny. Mr Cribbens is an all round good egg (never a scandal) and never fails to raise a smile. Knight him now.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
